aka: 科学频道 科幻科学：不可能的物理学

cast.name: 麦克斯·泰格马克 Max Tegmark

this_title: Sci Fi Science: Physics of the Impossible Season 1
trans_title: 科幻科学：不可能的物理学 第一季
科学频道 科幻科学：不可能的物理学
introduction: What first appears to be a send-up of classic science fiction is in fact a thorough examination of the real-world science behind the sensationalism. In the pilot episode, the physics behind a hypothetical alien invasion are explained. With the help of scientists and engineers from NASA, JPL, the Department of Energy, the U.S. Army, a major special effects studio, and various universities, the Sci-Fi Science crew explores force fields, lasers, lightning guns, rail guns, extrasolar planets and other "science fiction" concepts that are in fact, quite real. A campy, animation-rich alien invasion of Los Angeles provides the jumping-off point for real science demonstrations.
chinese_title: 科幻科学：不可能的物理学 第一季
foreign_title: Sci Fi Science: Physics of the Impossible Season 1
